flavor: "Fear is what keeps a man alive in this world of treachery and deceit."
name: Roose Bolton
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Roose Bolton is attacking, choose up to X total STR worth of characters controlled by the losing opponent. X is Roose Bolton's STR. Sacrifice Roose Bolton to kill each of those characters.

flavor: Harrenhal had seen more horror in its three hundred years than Casterly Rock had witnessed in three thousand.
name: Harrenhal
text: Reaction: After a character enters play, kneel your faction card and sacrifice Harrenhal to kill it.

flavor: "He said that all his other knights wanted things of him, castles or honors or riches, but all that Brienne wanted was to die for him." <cite>The Knight of Flowers</cite>
name: Brienne of Tarth
text: Renown. While you control a King character or Catelyn Stark, Brienne of Tarth does not kneel when declared as a defender.

flavor: "Only Renly could vex me so with a piece of fruit." <cite>Stannis Baratheon</cite>
name: Offer of a Peach
text: Play only if you control Renly Baratheon or a Lady character. Challenges Action: Choose an attacking character. Stand that character and remove it from the challenge.

flavor: "Even so, he's never turned a ranger away from his fire" <cite>Thoren Smallwood</cite>
name: Craster
text: Immune to Omen card effects. Action: Sacrifice Craster to put each character that was killed this phase into play from its owner's dead pile.

flavor: Dragonglass. What the maesters call obsidian.
name: Dragonglass Dagger
text:
[thenightswatch] character only.
While attached character is participating in a challenge, it gets +2 STR and is immune to opponent's character abilities.

flavor: "Aye, I've broken laws, but I never felt evil until tonight."
name: Ser Davos Seaworth
text: Stealth. Reaction: After Ser Davos Seaworth bypasses a non-loyal character using stealth, either: draw 1 card, or gain 1 gold.

flavor: The morning air was dark with the smoke of burning gods.
name: Ritual of R'hllor
text: Reaction: After you win dominance, choose X standing R'hllor characters. Each of those characters gains 1 power.

flavor: "...you can lead a king to water, but with Joff one had to splash it about before he realized he could drink it." <cite>Littlefinger</cite>
name: Joffrey Baratheon
text: Reaction: After you marshal a loyal character, kneel that character and your faction card to choose and kill a non-King character with a lower printed cost.

flavor: In Chataya's brothel, Shae would have all the silks and gems she could wish for, and the gentlest highborn patrons.
name: Chataya's Brothel
text: Marshaling Action: Kneel a character with an [intrigue] icon to gain 1 gold. (Limit twice per phase.)

flavor: "M'lord, I am sent to show you to chambers."
name: Helya
text: Each attachment gains terminal.

flavor: The first three men had offered their lives to the Drowned God fearlessly...
name: Bless Him With Salt
text: Play only during a [power] challenge. Action: Choose a participating Drowned God or Ironborn character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +3 STR. If you win the challenge, draw 1 card.

flavor: ...Xaro Xhoan Daxos saw to it that the great and the humble alike offered some token to the Mother of Dragons.
name: Xaro Xhoan Daxos
text: Reaction: After you marshal a unique attachment, gain 2 gold. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Mother of Dragons
text: Stormborn character you control only. Challenges Action: During a challenge in which you control a participating Dragon character, kneel Mother of Dragons to have attached character participate in the challenge on your side.

flavor: The girl never wept. Young as she was, Myrcella Baratheon was a princess born.
name: Myrcella Baratheon
text: While there are no King characters in play, Myrcella Baratheon gains renown and does not kneel when declared as a defender in a [power] challenge.

name: The Prince's Pass
text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge as the defending player, kneel The Prince's Pass to choose an attacking character. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a challenge icon of your choice. Then, if it has no challenge icons, you may sacrifice The Prince's Pass to discard it from play.

flavor: The silent sisters prepared men for the grave, and it was ill fortune to look on the face of death.
name: Silent Sisters
text: Silent Sisters gets +1 STR for each character in your dead pile.

flavor: The Frostfangs have a cruel bite, even in summer...
name: The Frostfangs
text: Reaction: After The Frostfangs enters play, give control of it to an opponent. -1 Reserve.

name: Quiet as a Shadow
text: Action: Choose a unique character with printed cost 3 or lower. Until the end of the phase, that character gains stealth.

name: Ghosts of Harrenhal
text: When Revealed: Put the top character in each player's dead pile into play.
